title: Is it impossible to get 100 marks in maths? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, not at all. You can score 100 in maths easily. It is one of those subjects where you just need practice to score 100/100. All you need to do is make your concepts clear about how and where to apply the suitable method for the problem. And the most important thing, TIME MANAGEMENT. Many of the students face this problem, they know the paper but due to lack of time, they cannot complete the paper on time. So you should also learn to manage your time while doing mathematics. Practice makes a man Perfect. Remember: Nothing is impossible in this world. Peace! Gouri Duggal
